item.description:
We will be playing casino games... poker, roulette, and craps... and a few
surprise games.

We will provide some food and beverages, you are welcome to bring a favorite snack for the evening.

*If anyone has poker chips to contribute to the game-playing, please bring them.
**We do have a 15-year-old cat, but she will be locked up in the upstairs bedroom when guests are here.
***Parking: only a few spots in our driveway, best bet is on Bowdoin Drive - will send more details to attendees.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Casino Game Night in Haverhill
